summary: Removes the Lover\'s Comfort buff from the game.
descriptionHtml:
In short, this mod prevents you from getting bonus experience from Lover\'s Comfort buff. 

I play with reduced levelling mods, so I don\'t like any bonus experience, and I didn\'t find any mod removing this single buff. 

Please note I\'m in no way a modder, and couldn\'t figure how to prevent the buff to be cast on the player. I just switched its duration from 8 to 0 hours. (For this reason, you\'ll still get the message about getting the buff, but you won\'t see it in the active magic effects tabs). 

INSTALLATION: just drop the .esp in your \\skyrim\\data folder and enable it. Load order shouldn\'t matter.
author: Kitako
